entities.name: potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as the one who needs to go down to the Quidditch field at nine o'clock.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Mr. Bagman will be present at the Quidditch field to tell the champions about the third task.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who is left in Gryffindor Tower.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who is left in Gryffindor Tower.

entities.name: cedric
entities.description: Cedric Diggory is mentioned as a Hufflepuff student who meets Harry on the way to the Quidditch field.

entities.name: fleur
entities.description: Fleur Delacour is mentioned as one of the champions who thinks they need to find treasure in underground tunnels.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as someone Harry can ask for help with the task.

entities.name: gryffindor tower
entities.description: Gryffindor Tower is mentioned as a location where Ron and Hermione are left by Harry.

entities.name: hufflepuff common room
entities.description: The Hufflepuff common room is mentioned as the place from which Cedric comes up.

entities.name: quidditch field
entities.description: The Quidditch field is mentioned as a location where Harry and Cedric go to meet Mr. Bagman.

entities.name: underground tunnels
entities.description: Underground tunnels are mentioned as a possible place where the treasure can be found.

entities.name: treasure
entities.description: Treasure is mentioned as something that needs to be found by the champions.

relationships.description: Mr. Bagman will meet Harry Potter at the Quidditch field.
Harry left Ron and Hermione in Gryffindor Tower before going down to the Quidditch field.
Cedric came up from the Hufflepuff common room when he met Harry.
Harry went down to the Quidditch field at nine o'clock.
Mr. Bagman will tell the champions about the third task.
Fleur thinks that underground tunnels are where they need to find treasure.
Harry can ask Hagrid for help with the task.
